body.p: You can open and edit files directly from an archive using the Archive Browser view. When saving the file back to archive, you are prompted to choose if you want the application to make a backup copy of the archive before saving the new content. If you choose Never ask me again, you will not be asked again to make backup copies. You can re-enable the dialog pop-up from the Messages preferences page. You can re-enable the dialog pop-up from the Archive preferences page.
body.note: All changes made to the structure of an archive, or to the contents of the files inside an archive are immediately saved.
